headline: 3 Magnificent S&P 500 Dividend Stocks Down 20% to Buy and Hold Forever
summary: The S&P 500 has rallied about 25% over the past year.  Several top real estate investment trusts (REITs) are down about 20% from their recent highs, including Realty Income (NYSE: O), Prologis (NYSE: PLD), and Extra Space Storage (NYSE: EXR).  Because of that, these excellent dividend stocks offer even higher dividend yields, making them great stocks to buy now and hold for a potential lifetime of passive dividend income.
